title: Kamatte Shinsotsu-chan ga Maikai Sasotte Kuru: Nee Senpai, Shigoto mo Koi mo Kyouiku Shite Moratte Ii desu ka? - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Clumsy Love Interests   Co-Workers   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Early Romance   Friendship   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Salaryman
author: Nagiki Eko   凪木エコ
description:
Masato Kazama is 26 years old. He is a salaryman working at a high pressure company… an advertising agency. He is what you would call a “corporate drone.”

Masato’s junior, the new-graduated employee Nagisa Inami, is the perfect heroine.
She is beautiful, stylish, and is quick to learn her job. In addition, she is friendly and sociable. If there is one drawback to Nagisa, it is that she likes her trainer, Masato, a little too much.

A relationship between the two may begin to be born in this story…. Or not.>
